get_a_quote_text: SONATA RESOURCES INDONESIA is committed to always providing competitive, safe and innovative technical solutions in accordance with customer needs, contract specifications, applicable legal & regulatory requirements.

service_content.1:
Is a professional service designed to assist organizations in planning, execution, monitoring, and completion of projects efficiently and effectively. This service supports project managers and teams by providing expertise, tools, and project management methodologies to ensure that projects proceed according to the defined budget, schedule, and scope of work.
This service can be delivered by a dedicated internal team or third party (consultants) and is typically used across various sectors, including construction, information technology, manufacturing, public services, and the government sector.
Scope of Services (What's Included):
1. Project Planning & SchedulingDevelopment of Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)Development of project schedules (timeline, Gantt chart, milestones)Resource and budget planning
2. Project Monitoring & ReportingProject progress trackingPeriodic project status reportingIdentification and escalation of project issues/challenges
3. Risk ManagementIdentification of project risksAssessment of risk impact and probabilityRisk mitigation and response strategies
4. Documentation & Knowledge ManagementProject document management (including version control)Recording of lessons learnedCreation of technical and administrative documentation
5. Stakeholder Communication SupportCoordination of project meetingsCreation of minutes and follow-up on decisionsSupport for communication between teams and stakeholders
6. Tools & System SupportManagement of project management tools (such as Microsoft Project, Jira, Asana, Trello)Integration of automated reporting systemsTraining on project management tools
7. Change Management SupportAssistance in scope change processesAdjustment of work plans due to changesCommunication of changes to the team and stakeholders
service_content.2:
Is a technical service that includes planning, design, analysis, development, supervision, and optimization of systems or technical infrastructure across various engineering fields. This service aims to provide innovative, efficient, and standard-compliant solutions to technical challenges faced by clients in sectors such as industry, construction, energy, manufacturing, technology, and the public sector.
Engineering Services may include consulting, technical design, simulation, feasibility studies, and comprehensive supervision of engineering project execution.
Scope of Services (What's Included):
1. Engineering Design & DraftingTechnical design (mechanical, civil, electrical, structural, etc.)Creation of working drawings (CAD, BIM, 3D modeling)Technical specifications and construction details
2. Technical ConsultingTechnical feasibility studies and needs analysisConsultation on technology, material, and work method selectionEvaluation and mitigation of technical risks
3. Project Engineering SupportTechnical coordination between teams and contractorsTechnical scheduling and quality controlTechnical documentation and reporting
4. Supervision & Quality ControlSupervision of project execution based on engineering standardsInspection of material and work qualityVerification of compliance with technical specifications
5. System Integration & OptimizationIntegration of various engineering system components (e.g., automation, control, mechanical)Optimization of existing system performanceImplementation of energy efficiency or sustainability systems
6. Testing & CommissioningSystem and equipment testing prior to operationPerformance validation according to standardsSupport during start-up and initial operational phases
service_content.3:
Is a comprehensive construction project supervision service to ensure that the work is carried out in accordance with the design, technical specifications, budget, schedule, and established safety and quality standards. This service aims to maintain construction quality, prevent deviations from the plan, and ensure the smooth execution of the construction process from start to finish.
Construction supervision acts as the project owner's technical representative on site, supervising contractors and subcontractors, and providing technical and administrative recommendations throughout the construction process.
Scope of Services (What's Included):
1. Daily Site SupervisionMonitoring daily activities on siteVerification of material usage and work methodsDocumentation of construction activities
2. Quality Control & AssuranceInspection of work quality and compliance with technical specificationsTesting of materials and work results according to standardsHandling and reporting of non-conformance findings
3. Progress Monitoring & ReportingTracking project progress against the schedule (timeline)Preparation of daily, weekly, and monthly progress reportsEvaluation of schedule deviations and corrective recommendations
4. Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE) SupervisionSupervision of the implementation of occupational health and safety standards (HSE)Assessment of safety risks at the project siteMonitoring of environmental impacts from construction
5. Coordination and CommunicationCoordination between the project owner, contractors, consultants, and other relevant partiesFacilitation of technical meetings and on-site problem solvingPreparation of meeting minutes and follow-ups
6. Cost and Change ControlVerification of additional work (variation orders) and design changesTechnical recommendations on changes in work volumeCost control at the construction site
service_content.4:
Is a technical inspection and assessment service of materials, components, equipment, or field work to ensure compliance with technical specifications, quality standards, regulations, and contract requirements. The main goal of this service is to guarantee the quality and safety of products or work results before, during, and after implementation.
This service can be applied in various sectors such as construction, manufacturing, energy, oil and gas, electricity, as well as transportation and logistics industries.
Scope of Services (What's Included):
1. Pre-Inspection (Factory / Material Inspection)Inspection of material or goods quality before delivery to the project siteVerification of quality certificates and compliance with technical specificationsWitness test at factory or laboratory
2. On-Site InspectionDirect inspection of construction work on siteVerification of installation, assembly, or execution according to working drawingsDocumentation of work results and detection of deviations
3. Non-Destructive Testing (NDT)Testing without damaging the object, such as ultrasonic test, radiographic test, dye penetrant test, magnetic particle testEvaluation of metal structures, weld joints, and mechanical components
4. Welding InspectionSupervision and evaluation of welding processesVerification of welding procedures and welder certificationsInspection of welding results according to standards (ASME, AWS, ISO, etc.)
5. Coating & Painting InspectionInspection of thickness, method, and quality of coating/paintingAdhesion test and corrosion protection
6. Final Inspection & HandoverFinal inspection of the entire work or productVerification of compliance with the checklistPreparation of final report and handover recommendations
service_content.5:
Is a technical assistance service provided at the final stage of a project before the system, facility, or equipment is fully operated. This service includes preparation, testing, verification, and initial startup activities to ensure that the entire system runs according to the design, technical specifications, and applicable safety standards.
The main goal of this service is to ensure a smooth transition from the construction phase to the operational phase, minimize the risk of system failure, and guarantee operational readiness both technically and functionally.
Scope of Services (What's Included):
1. Pre-Commissioning SupportVerification of system installation (mechanical, electrical, instrumentation, and control)Initial subsystem testing (leak test, continuity test, flushing, etc.)Checking the readiness of technical documentation and work instructions
2. Functional TestingFunctional testing of equipment and control systemsCalibration and setting of equipment parameters according to specificationsOperation flow simulation to ensure system reliability
3. Start-up AssistanceAssistance in the initial operation of the system/machineMonitoring of initial performance and operational stabilizationIdentification and resolution of issues during start-up
4. Safety and Compliance CheckVerification of safety and protection systemsInspection of compliance with regulations and licensing standardsChecking alarms, interlock systems, and emergency procedures
5. Documentation & ReportingPreparation of commissioning and start-up reportsProvision of checklists and test resultsRecommendations for improvements or adjustments before handover
6. Training & Handover SupportTechnical training for operators and maintenance teamsSubmission of complete technical documentation (manuals, SOPs, etc.)Support during the system handover process to the operational team
service_content.6:
Is a comprehensive service for managing and maintaining industrial facilities or plants to ensure that production processes run optimally, safely, efficiently, and in accordance with applicable operational standards. This service includes daily operations, system performance monitoring, scheduled maintenance, troubleshooting, resource management, and technical documentation.
The main goal of this service is to maximize plant availability, reliability, and operational efficiency, while minimizing downtime, system failure risks, and unexpected costs.
Scope of Services (What's Included):
1. Daily OperationOperation of production systems, utilities, and supporting equipmentReal-time monitoring of process parameters (flow, pressure, temperature, etc.)Daily performance reporting and operational logs
2. Preventive & Predictive MaintenanceRoutine maintenance based on schedule (lubrication, cleaning, part replacement)Use of data and sensors to detect potential failures in advanceAnalysis of equipment performance trends
3. Corrective & Breakdown MaintenanceImmediate handling of system breakdowns or disruptionsDiagnosis of issues and quick repairDocumentation of corrective and preventive actions
4. Asset & Inventory ManagementManagement of spare parts and supporting equipmentInventory control and usage trackingRecording of technical asset age and condition
5. Performance OptimizationEvaluation of energy efficiency and production outputRecommendations for system and process improvementsImplementation of automatic control technologies and digitalization
6. Safety, Health & Environmental (SHE) ComplianceImplementation of work safety proceduresMonitoring of emissions, waste, and environmental complianceTeam training on HSE standards and SOPs
7. Reporting & DocumentationPreparation of daily, weekly, and monthly O&M reportsManagement of technical documents (manuals, SOPs, work orders)Audit reporting and operational KPI tracking

about_text:
PT. Sonata Resources Indonesia
Is a company providing consulting services and human resource solutions focused on the Oil and Gas sector. We specialize in supplying professional experts who work directly for Operating Companies according to the needs and requests of clients.
With experience and deep understanding of the dynamics of the energy industry in Indonesia, we are committed to delivering reliable, competent, and highly dedicated services to support the success of our clients' projects. Our services include the recruitment of skilled labor, project resource management, and administrative and technical support for field operations.
We believe that the success of the oil and gas industry greatly depends on the quality of its human resources. Therefore, PT. Sonata Resources Indonesia is here as a strategic partner capable of providing precise, efficient HR solutions that meet industry standards.
Our MissionAs a competitive company, PT. Sonata Resources Indonesia aims to become one of the leading quality resource providers delivering effective solutions for its valued customers.
Our TeamA project management team to serve clients, focusing on the highest quality performance standards regardless of project size and scope. Working closely with our clients, we develop unique integrated solutions for each project while controlling costs and monitoring deadlines to ensure complete client satisfaction.
